definitions.definition: Any of the indica subspecies of the rice , Oryza sativa , which (unlike the japonica or sinica subspecies) are non-sticky and long-grained.
Marijuana of the species Cannabis indica .

main_definition: Any of the indica subspecies of the rice , Oryza sativa , which (unlike the japonica or sinica subspecies) are non-sticky and long-grained.
secondary_definitions: Marijuana of the species Cannabis indica .
